title: Hardscaping Specialists
intro: Engineered patios, retaining walls, and stepping systems built with premium stone, concrete, and composite materials.

avgCost.notes: Higher ranges include structural walls, drainage, and lighting.

highlights: 3D renderings with material swatches and grading plans
Permeable or traditional paver systems with hidden drainage
Integrated lighting, seating, and fire features

faqs.q: Can you help with HOA approvals?
faqs.a: We prepare detailed submittal packages including structural notes, product cut sheets, and finish samples for HOA review.
